summary: This document appears to be an email from an individual named Sarah, sent on September 2, 2007, providing feedback and edits on a draft essay titled 'Why I want to attend FIT'. The email contains the essay text, which describes the author's background in fashion, modeling, and retail, and their desire to attend the Fashion Institute of Technology. The document's connection to the Epstein case is unclear from this excerpt alone, as it contains no direct references to Epstein, criminal activity, or associated individuals.
